title: Aurelion Sol: The Star Forger Returns

replies.body: Yes, another Dragon to enslave!

{{champion:102}} ".. Father?"

{{item:2043}} "Simba- I mean, Shyvana. Look up to the stars."

*Suddenly Lion King music starts playing*
nice, now they can change shyvana the half-dragon to half-wyvern
God dammit Rito you want to change my main now? XD

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zHgRLQdu,comment-id=00060001,timestamp=2016-03-03T20:45:12.214+0000)
>
> Your name is so appropriate to the video, too!

So, he is most definitely a star dragon and not a lightning dragon now... but... will he have a lightning themed release skin?  I'm all about those blue bolts of enemy destroying goodness.

> [{quoted}](name=Velasan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zHgRLQdu,comment-id=000600010000,timestamp=2016-03-03T20:52:28.445+0000)
>
> So, he is most definitely a star dragon and not a lightning dragon now... but... will he have a lightning themed release skin?  I'm all about those blue bolts of enemy destroying goodness.

I know you're trying to squeeze any info you can out of me, but I was _super_ careful to state that Stars Shaper's name was appropriate to the video.  I'm saying nothing beyond that, and implying nothing more than what I literally wrote!

Or, you know, they'd be very angry with me.  Please turn off the harsh angle-poise lamps and step away from the red hot iron tools!

(Also, I love that teaser.  I particularly like how the glowing effect 'falls' out of the sky at the same time as he says "Some... fall to their knees".  Neat.)
The music is so beautiful I teared up. I love space themed music. I hope his log-in will be similar in taste and longer... And appear soon enough for me not to go crazy over it ;___;

> [{quoted}](name=Marbelara,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zHgRLQdu,comment-id=00060001000000010007,timestamp=2016-03-03T22:47:40.710+0000)
>
> The music is so beautiful I teared up. I love space themed music. I hope his log-in will be similar in taste and longer... And appear soon enough for me not to go crazy over it ;___;

I sent an email to the audio team to thank them from the music - I even put the video on repeat to hear more of it!  I keep convincing myself I hear Bard-like instruments kick in around 0:23, but that's total head-canon.  And oooh those _thumps_ at 0:33!!

IMO, those peeps did wonders with it - but now I have to_ wait_ for the login music to drop!

Otherwise, a lot runeterran has to mix their power. They can even need Ascendeds.

Each time a cosmic being appears it seems like Xerath becomes more powerful (or we discover he is) remember that he can "See the forces that hold the Universe together". He has a comprehension of this world we do not know.

On the note, Aurelion Sol seems IMMENSIVELY OP. Out of the league of anything appeared here, he is like Bard gone bad and on steroid.

More like:

http://neveryetmelted.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/Galactus.jpg

The power creep in the lore is getting stupid. Riot apparently wants people to care about the lore again, but how can there be any tension when one of the champions (which is to say, one of its protagonists) is a cosmic star maker that is literally billions of times more powerful than every other character combined?

Were he just a facet of the lore it would be one thing (if still stupid), but how we take Miss Fortune's struggle for control over Bilgewater seriously when there is a champion that could flatten it with his finger?

Also, the trailer implies that Aurelion Sol is a malevolent, or at least harmful, entity. If that is the case, how exactly will the lore justify Runeterra's survival? Is our resident mentally disabled Yordle going to beat him up with her big hammer?

I felt the same way about Kindred's release ("The new champion is literally death and as such it's impossible to fight her, but we made her a character in this video game and are gonna have Garen be able to beat her up!"), but Aurelion Sol is literally billions (probably more) of times more powerful, assuming the visuals in this video are accurate. At least Kindred was bound to Runeterra.

At least Kindred was bound to Runeterra.

The reason I think this will work, with him being extremely powerful, is that Leona, Diana, and Pantheon seem to be gearing up for a fight with him. Taric may also end up being involved.

And the good guys always win.

If Aurelion ends up being a Juggernaut, AP or otherwise, it would make sense in game too. A slow, kitable colossus, that deals massive damage, like Illaoi and Garen.

> [{quoted}](name=Crewx,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zHgRLQdu,comment-id=003a0000,timestamp=2016-03-03T22:18:44.946+0000)

That's what makes it so stupid.

Leona, Diana, and Pantheon *shouldn't be able to fight him*, if this video and his title are literal he is powerful enough to destroy all of Runeterra by slightly shifting to the left. 

The shift in power is too abrupt. Leona can't just go from killing some bandits to taking on the League equivalent to Galactus. It's not believable. It's stupid.
